channel.title: One More
channel.description:
My Last Question
How do i fix Testscape so that it save a players game every so often and not when they click log out?

item.title: One More
item.dc:creator: @jungledude jungledude
item.description:
@jungledude wrote:

if(resetanim <= 0)
{
//resetAnimation();
//resetanim = 8;
}

neadminather();


appendPos();

smitimer -= 1;
if(smitimer <= 1)
{
savechar();
println_debug("Auto saved game.");
savemoreinfo();
if(savemoreinfo())
{
sendMessage("Your game has been auto saved!");
attempts = 0;
smitimer = 600;
}
else if(!savemoreinfo() && attempts <= 5)
{
println_debug("Error saving moreinfo file! Retrying in 5 seconds");
println_debug("Attempts: "+attempts);
attempts += 1;
smitimer = 5;
}
else if(!savemoreinfo() && attempts >= 5)
{
println_debug("Attempts: "+attempts+" - Giving up saving moreinfo file!");
attempts += 1;
smitimer = 99999999;
}
}

Read full topic
